snippet: A Russian Air Force MiG-29 fighter jet crashed Thursday afternoon near Chita, a city in Eastern Siberia, slamming into a hill close to a local airport and killing the pilot.
lead_paragraph: A Russian Air Force MiG-29 fighter jet crashed Thursday afternoon near Chita, a city in Eastern Siberia, slamming into a hill close to a local airport and killing the pilot.

headline.main: Russia: Fighter Jet Crashes, Killing Pilot
headline.print_headline: Russia: Fighter Jet Crashes, Killing Pilot
